name: Kit Twins II: Feline Groovy
description:
GAMEPAD (recommended)

  • D-Pad/Joystick - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Advance Dialog

KEYBOARD

  • WASD - Move
  • SPACEBAR - Jump
  • ENTER - Advance Dialog

Game renders best in full-screen

Known bug - For some reason the dice roll animation occasionally loops a couple of extra times.  When it does this it appears to consistently land on the third roll and in no other way affects gameplay.

Kit-Twins II: Feline Groovy is my submission to the GMTKJam 2022.  Last years jam was my first jam and first ever completed game and I thought it would be neat to make a sequel of it as a test to see how far I've progressed in a year.  No code from the first Kit-Twins was reused in this years entry.  Mostly because it is against the rules and spirit of the jam, but also because it was very poorly written.  If out of morbid curiosity anyone wants to check out the original Kit-Twins here is a link.

CREDITS

  • Cats - Elthen's Pixel Art Shop
  • Robot Boi and Environment - Penusbmic
  • Parallax Backgrounds - Ansimuz and Vnitti
  • Tileset - Cyangmou
  • Environment - Wishforge
  • Dice - Kicked-in-Teeth

Music

  • Sunny D - Jaeden Camstra
  • Flirt - Kevatta
  • Bonita - Psalm Trees
  • Ocean Morning - Jaeden Camstra
  • Beleze Pula - Masayoshi Takanaka

Assets

  • Pixel Crushers Dialogue System
  • Rewired
  • Indie Tale's Platformer Shadow
  • Easy Credits 2
